dismemberments.name: Severed Hand
dismemberments.description: The devastating blow severs the hand at the wrist, permanently removing it from the body.

effects.name: Severed Hand
effects.description: You have lost your hand. You cannot use this hand to hold items or weapons. You cannot wield two-handed weapons or use items requiring two hands unless you have a prosthetic.

penalties.condition: when using one-handed weapons in remaining hand

dismemberments.name: Severed Arm
dismemberments.description: The brutal strike severs the entire arm, removing it permanently from the body.

effects.name: Severed Arm
effects.description: You have lost your entire arm. You cannot use this arm at all. You cannot wield two-handed weapons, use shields, or use items requiring two hands unless you have a prosthetic. You take a -4 circumstance penalty to Athletics checks to Climb and Swim.

dismemberments.name: Severed Foot
dismemberments.description: The crushing blow severs the foot at the ankle, permanently crippling mobility.

effects.name: Severed Foot
effects.description: You have lost your foot. Your Speed is reduced by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet). You take a -4 circumstance penalty to Acrobatics and Athletics checks involving movement unless you have a prosthetic.

dismemberments.name: Severed Leg
dismemberments.description: The devastating strike severs the entire leg, permanently removing mobility.

effects.name: Severed Leg
effects.description: You have lost your entire leg. You cannot Stride or Step without aid. You must Crawl or use crutches/prosthetic. Your Speed is reduced to 5 feet when crawling. You automatically fall prone when you lose your balance.

dismemberments.name: Destroyed Eye
dismemberments.description: The piercing attack destroys the eye, permanently blinding it.

effects.name: Destroyed Eye
effects.description: You have lost vision in one eye. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and ranged attack rolls due to impaired depth perception.

dismemberments.name: Both Eyes Destroyed
dismemberments.description: The catastrophic blow destroys both eyes, leaving permanent blindness.

effects.name: Blinded
effects.description: You have lost vision in both eyes and are permanently blinded. You cannot see and automatically critically fail Perception checks requiring sight. You must use other senses to navigate.

dismemberments.name: Severed Ear
dismemberments.description: The slashing attack severs the ear, permanently reducing hearing.

effects.name: Severed Ear
effects.description: You have lost one ear. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to auditory Perception checks.

dismemberments.name: Both Ears Destroyed
dismemberments.description: The devastating attack destroys both ears, causing permanent deafness.

effects.name: Deafened
effects.description: You have lost hearing in both ears and are permanently deafened. You automatically critically fail auditory Perception checks.

dismemberments.name: Severed Wing
dismemberments.description: The slashing blow severs the wing, permanently grounding the creature.

effects.name: Severed Wing
effects.description: You have lost a wing. If you had a fly Speed, it is reduced by half. You take a -4 circumstance penalty to Acrobatics checks while flying.

dismemberments.name: Both Wings Severed
dismemberments.description: The brutal attacks sever both wings, permanently removing the ability to fly.

effects.name: Both Wings Severed
effects.description: You have lost both wings. You lose your fly Speed entirely and cannot use any ability that requires wings.

dismemberments.name: Severed Tail
dismemberments.description: The slicing attack severs the tail, permanently affecting balance.

effects.name: Severed Tail
effects.description: You have lost your tail. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to Acrobatics checks to Balance and you cannot use abilities that require your tail.

dismemberments.name: Mangled Fingers
dismemberments.description: The crushing blow mangles multiple fingers, permanently reducing dexterity.

effects.name: Mangled Fingers
effects.description: Several of your fingers are mangled beyond repair. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to checks using Thievery and to attack rolls with weapons requiring fine manipulation.

dismemberments.name: Severed Major Branch
dismemberments.description: A powerful blow severs one of the creature's major branches, removing a limb-like appendage.

effects.name: Severed Major Branch
effects.description: You have lost a major branch. You cannot use this limb to manipulate objects or make attacks. You cannot wield two-handed weapons or use items requiring multiple limbs unless you have a grafted replacement.

dismemberments.name: Severed Minor Branch
dismemberments.description: A slashing attack severs one of the creature's smaller branches.

effects.name: Severed Minor Branch
effects.description: You have lost a smaller branch. You take a -1 circumstance penalty to checks using fine manipulation.

dismemberments.name: Split Trunk
dismemberments.description: A devastating blow splits the creature's trunk or main body, causing severe structural damage.

effects.name: Split Trunk
effects.description: Your trunk has been split. You leak sap constantly and your structural integrity is compromised. You take a -4 circumstance penalty to all physical checks and your maximum HP is reduced by 25%.

dismemberments.name: Torn Roots
dismemberments.description: The attack tears apart the creature's root system, severely impairing mobility.

effects.name: Torn Roots
effects.description: Your roots have been torn away. Your Speed is reduced by 15 feet (minimum 5 feet) and you cannot burrow. You take a -4 circumstance penalty to checks to resist being moved or knocked prone.

dismemberments.name: Cracked Bark
dismemberments.description: The impact cracks and splinters the creature's protective bark.

effects.name: Cracked Bark
effects.description: Your protective bark is permanently cracked. You take a -1 circumstance penalty to AC.

dismemberments.name: Damaged Canopy
dismemberments.description: The attack damages the creature's leafy canopy or crown, impairing its senses.

effects.name: Damaged Canopy
effects.description: Your canopy or crown has been damaged. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks.

dismemberments.name: Broken Joint
dismemberments.description: The impact shatters one of the construct's mechanical joints.

effects.name: Broken Joint
effects.description: One of your joints has been shattered. You cannot use this limb effectively. You take a -3 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and skill checks using this limb.

dismemberments.name: Shattered Plating
dismemberments.description: A powerful blow shatters the construct's protective plating.

effects.name: Shattered Plating
effects.description: Your protective plating is shattered. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to AC and resistance to physical damage is reduced by 5 (minimum 0).

dismemberments.name: Severed Control Cables
dismemberments.description: The slashing attack severs critical control cables or tendons within the construct.

effects.name: Severed Control Cables
effects.description: Your control systems have been severed. You are clumsy 2 and your Speed is reduced by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet).

dismemberments.name: Cracked Animating Core
dismemberments.description: The attack cracks the construct's animating core or power source.

effects.name: Cracked Animating Core
effects.description: Your animating core is cracked and leaking energy. Your maximum HP is reduced by 30% and you are slowed 1.

dismemberments.name: Damaged Gears
dismemberments.description: The impact damages internal gears and mechanisms.

effects.name: Damaged Gears
effects.description: Your internal mechanisms are damaged and grinding. You take a -5 foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds and make noise when moving (cannot Sneak).

dismemberments.name: Dispersed Mass
dismemberments.description: The attack disperses a portion of the elemental's mass, weakening its form.

effects.name: Dispersed Mass
effects.description: Your elemental form has been dispersed. Your maximum HP is reduced by 20% and you take a -2 circumstance penalty to all physical attacks.

dismemberments.name: Weakened Elemental Core
dismemberments.description: The attack damages the elemental's core essence, reducing its power.

effects.name: Weakened Elemental Core
effects.description: Your elemental core has been weakened. All damage you deal is reduced by 2 and your resistance to your elemental type is reduced by 5.

dismemberments.name: Unstable Manifestation
dismemberments.description: The attack destabilizes the elemental's physical manifestation.

effects.name: Unstable Manifestation
effects.description: Your form flickers and wavers unpredictably. You take a -1 circumstance penalty to AC and Reflex saves.

dismemberments.name: Split Mass
dismemberments.description: The attack splits the ooze's mass, reducing its volume significantly.

effects.name: Split Mass
effects.description: Your mass has been split. Your maximum HP is reduced by 30% and your size effectively decreases by one category for the purpose of attacks and reach.

dismemberments.name: Separated Nucleus
dismemberments.description: The attack separates or damages the ooze's nucleus or core organelle.

effects.name: Separated Nucleus
effects.description: Your nucleus has been separated or destroyed. You are stunned 1 at the start of each turn and cannot divide or reproduce. Your maximum HP is reduced by 40%.

dismemberments.name: Diminished Cohesion
dismemberments.description: The attack reduces the ooze's ability to maintain cohesion.

effects.name: Diminished Cohesion
effects.description: Your cohesion is reduced. You cannot squeeze through spaces smaller than your normal size and your Speed is reduced by 5 feet.
